item.title: FreeBSD File Server
item.description: File Server Overview: ❑ Image that you are a TA of a course, the professor wants you to build a file server that students can submit their homework to ❑ To prevent your colleagues from accidentally deleting files on the server, the snapshot and rollback features are needed FTP Server Install pure-ftpd Install with pkg pkg install pure-ftpd Or install with port port install pure-ftpd 記得要 [x]UPLOADSCRIPT
